description:
Ready, set, chow down. This convenient two-person, non-stick cookset is great for portability, durability and efficiency. The cookware is made from hard-anodized aluminum and Teflon® Radiance technology for awesome abrasion-resistance.

  • Teflon Radiance enhances heat dispersion for quick and even heating
  • Clear nylon lid with integrated strainer is lightweight and durable. Silicone rim stands up to high temps
  • Includes 2L pot and a fry pan
  • Includes two insulated bowls and mugs
  • Includes folding pot gripper that locks and removes easily
  • Welded stuff sack doubles as a sink and wash basin
name: GSI Pinnacle Backpacker Cookware
